content: I'm glad you provided those recommendations. I'll definitely check them out. By the way, like I mentioned earlier, I recently got a new phone case with a built-in screen protector, and it's been working well so far. The screen protector is clear, and I can barely notice it's there. Plus, it's helped protect my screen from scratches, especially since my sister dropped my phone and got a small scratch on the bottom edge of the screen.
